thread.title: Re: Takes one to know one: WATCH Women’s March leader Linda Sarsour call Trump and Netanyahu bigots
thread.title_full: Re: Takes one to know one: WATCH Women’s March leader Linda Sarsour call Trump and Netanyahu bigots

author: Name
title: Re: Takes one to know one: WATCH Women’s March leader Linda Sarsour call Trump and Netanyahu bigots
text:
Takes 1 to know 1: WATCH Women’s March ‘leader’ Linda Sarsour call Trump and Netanyahu bigots Posted at 4:37 pm on February 16, 2017 by Sam J. 
Because nothing says girl power like one of the leaders of the Women’s March standing outside of the White House and calling President Trump and Netanyahu bigots … 
Watch this video of Linda Sarsour if you can stomach it: . @lsarsour now in front of the White House: Trump & Netanyahu are two "bigoted peas in a hateful pod." pic.twitter.com/jK6dXjf2Lz 
— Our Revolution (@OurRevolution) February 15, 2017 
Who does she think she is, saying Netanyahu isn’t welcome in our country? Does she realize she’s in America? 
Bigoted peas in a hateful pod, says the bigoted pea herself.
